channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 289d8817-ee69-43f1-a0af-43a45505b488
Display name: Azure Kubernetes Service Namespace Contributor
Description: Allows users to create and manage Azure Kubernetes Service namespace resources.
Link: https://management.azure.com/289d8817-ee69-43f1-a0af-43a45505b488?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: c9f76ca8-b262-4b10-8ed2-09cf0948aa35
Display name: Azure Kubernetes Service Namespace User
Description: Allows users to read Azure Kubernetes Service namespace resources. In-cluster namespace access further requires assignment of Azure Kubernetes Service RBAC roles to the namespace resource for an Entra ID enabled cluster.
Link: https://management.azure.com/c9f76ca8-b262-4b10-8ed2-09cf0948aa35?api-version=2022-04-01
